version_description:
- Complete UI Redesign
- New Feature: Links - create sharable links for your files.
- Faster upload and download
- Select multiple Images and Videos
- Custom Image Picker
- Performance Improvements
- Major bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

- Fix extra file transfer reward.
- Fix ad displaying.
- Certain errors will no longer crash the app.
- Minor bug fixes & improvements.

- See the files you have sent.
- Display who sent you a certain file.
- Allow more free transfers.
- Select more files per transfer.
- Information popups to learn how to use the app.
- Bug fixes.
- Performance improvements.
